alert.note: Alert for Johnson County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 6:19PM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Johnson County through 645 PM CDT... At 619 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Holman, or 9 miles northeast of Clarksville, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Clarksville... Lamar... Knoxville... Holman... Woodland... Lutherville... Hillcrest in Johnson County... Harmony... MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Johnson County Higher Elevations; Southern Johnson County
